text: "Philadelphia Freedom" is a 1975 song by Elton John. It was credited as The Elton John Band and went to number 1 in the United States, Canada and New Zealand, number 12 in the United Kingdom and number 4 in Australia. The song appeared on John's 1977 album Elton John's Greatest Hits Volume II. It was covered by Hall & Oates in 1991 for their album Two Rooms. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Hall & Oates songs Category:Disco songs
title: Philadelphia Freedom (song)
